articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Also, Web3 CEO Maggie Love asks just how decentralized Ethereum is if Amazon hosts most of the network’s nodes.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Did Israeli Regulators Know How Insolvent Celsius Was? And Did Bitboy Really Let Atozy Off the Hook?

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The founder of the fake OneCoin hasn't been seen since 2017, and made the FBI's Most Wanted List with a $100,000 reward.
articles.title: The FBI's Newest Podcast Subject? The Crypto Queen on the Run

articles.description: Scott Hansen aka Tycho, the musician, producer, and songwriter, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin how he caught the crypto bug and why he believes Web3 can change the music industry for the better.
articles.title: From Silk Road to Buying ETH: How Musician Tycho Went Crypto

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The week was relatively quiet in terms of market-moving news—until Fed Chair Jay Powell took the podium in Jackson Hole.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin, Ethereum Sink on Freaky Fed Friday

articles.author: Chris Stokel-Walker
articles.description: The metaverse has been touted as the place where we’ll spend our lives in the future—but the visuals still leave a lot to be desired.
articles.title: After $177 Billion in Investment, Why Do Metaverse Graphics Still Suck?

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: BTC and ETH fell precipitously after Fed Chair Jay Powell’s remarks in Jackson Hole on Friday.
articles.title: Bitcoin Slips Below $20,000 After Fed Chair's Comments in Jackson Hole

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Cardano Founder Charles Hoskinson says the Vasil Hard Fork is set for September. “We’re not quite over the finish line.”
articles.title: Coming Soon: The Cardano Hard Fork

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: When unpacking his idea of a digital country, Srinivasan pointed to Ethereum’s domain service as a key tool for building the Network State.
articles.title: Balaji Srinivasan’s ‘Network State’ Could See Citizens Swap Passports for Ethereum Names

articles.author: Daniel Roberts
articles.description: The SEC chief has gone from rhetoric to enforcement, targeting token projects from the present and past. Crypto companies are shook.
articles.title: The Sheriff of Cryptoville Draws His Pistol

articles.author: Emily Tonelli
articles.description: The Enforcement Directorate, India's financial crimes agency, has accused crypto exchange CoinSwitch Kuber of violating forex laws.
articles.title: India’s Financial Watchdog Investigates CoinSwitch Offices: Report

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: "The tribe has spoken." That is, unless the tribe leadership overrules the initial member vote...
articles.title: How a Tribe DAO Revote Shows the Flaws in DAO Governance

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: A product of barrelDAO, Solana Summer Shandy beer features NFT avatars from the biggest projects on SOL.
articles.title: Solana Now Has a Beer—With DeGods, Okay Bears and Other NFTs on the Can

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Lists of fantasy gear sparked a market boom (and bust), but also the imagination of builders. Loot-inspired games and media are nearing release—and a “Loot 2” NFT launch could accelerate growth.
articles.title: Loot, One Year Later: The NFT Hype Is Dead—But 'Lootverse' Hope Lives On

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The announcement from Coinbase comes as ETHW, a proposed proof-of-work Ethereum alternative, has plunged 93% in daily trading volume.
articles.title: Coinbase Will Consider Listing Ethereum Forks Following Merge

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Popular cloud service provider Hetzner hosts over 10% of Ethereum nodes—but the company says this violates its terms of service.
articles.title: Ethereum Nodes Largely Run on Cloud Services—This Host Says They’re Banned

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said interest rates may continue to rise in order to tame inflation, leading to a crypto market sell-off.
articles.title: Bitcoin Tanks After Powell Says Fed May Keep Raising Interest Rates

articles.author: Tom Farren
articles.description: Lido Finance’s native token has fallen amid slowing demand for staking and mixed expectations of the upcoming Ethereum merge event.
articles.title: Token Powering Ethereum Staking Platform Lido Finance Tumbles

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The new iteration of the Compound protocol targets security, capital efficiency, and improved user experience.
articles.title: Crypto Lending Platform Compound Rolls Out Fresh Upgrade for DeFi Users

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The U.S financial regulator has again delayed the decision on VanEck's latest spot Bitcoin ETF application by 45 days.
articles.title: SEC Delays VanEck's Bitcoin ETF Decision Another 45 Days

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The hash rate of ETC hits an all-time high, which reduces the risks of a "51% attack."
articles.title: Miners Eye Ethereum Classic Activity as Merge Nears

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Despite a no-politics policy, the exchange is stepping in, calling the midterms “the most important in crypto’s history.”
articles.title: Coinbase Launches Voter Registration Tool Ahead of November Elections

articles.author: Ryan Ozawa,Jason Nelson
articles.description: Sam Bankman Fried asserts that FTX and Alameda's venture investing divisions remain separate.
articles.title: FTX CEO Calls Alameda VC Merger Report a 'Big Misrepresentation'

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The rap legends will return to the award show after over a decade with their song “From the D to the LBC.”
articles.title: Snoop Dogg and Eminem to Bring Bored Ape NFTs to VMAs In ‘Otherside’ Metaverse Performance

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Polygon’s Sandeep Nailwal and Cere Network founder Kenzi Wang have launched Symbolic Capital.
articles.title: Polygon Founder Launches $50 Million Early-Stage Web3 Fund

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Users who have earned ample karma may be eligible to receive a free “Collectible Avatar” NFT minted on Polygon.
articles.title: Reddit Is Airdropping Free Polygon NFT Avatars to Its Most Hardcore Users

articles.author: MoreReese
articles.description: The data that makes up the content of NFTs needs to be stored somewhere—but not all NFT storage techniques are created equal.
articles.title: How Are NFTs Stored? On-Chain, Off-Chain and Decentralized Storage

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Provider of Web3 development tools Alchemy will make ChainShot’s educational content free as part of the acquisition.
articles.title: Alchemy Acquires Ethereum Coding Platform ChainShot

articles.author: Emily Tonelli
articles.description: The Tornado Cash developer has been ordered to stay in holding for another 90 days. It's still unclear what he has been charged with.
articles.title: Dutch Judge Orders Tornado Cash Dev to Stay in Jail for 3 More Months

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: Creators and designers need new tools to build the evolving metaverse—like Caduceus, the first open blockchain dedicated to metaverse development.
articles.title: The Metaverse: The Next 2 Years (And Beyond)

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Meme coin Shiba Inu leads the gains among the top 20 cryptocurrencies as its rapid token burn diminishes supply.
articles.title: SHIB Jumps 9% as Token Burn Intensifies

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Samsung is taking a second swing at launching a crypto exchange, with its initial plans reportedly thwarted by a lack of key talent.
articles.title: Samsung Slates Crypto Exchange Launch in South Korea for 2023: Report

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Nvidia reported a 19% overall revenue decline in Q2 2022 but is struggling to estimate the impact of crypto mining on the drop.
articles.title: Nvidia Has 'Limited Visibility' on Crypto Mining Impact in Q2 Revenue Drop

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Thieves looking to score expensive JPEGs have been busy over the last twelve months.
articles.title: Cybercriminals Have Stolen Over $100 Million in NFTs: Report

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Undeterred by an SEC probe, the exchange launches a new utility token before the merge.
articles.title: Coinbase Announces cbETH Wrapped Ethereum Staking Token

articles.author: Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: "Imagine how thin-skinned you have to be to do this," Atozy says, raising $200,000 for his legal defense.
articles.title: Bitboy vs. Atozy: YouTuber Drops Publicly Filed Lawsuit Because It Went Public

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Ethereum Foundation is quadrupling bug bounties ahead of the network’s long-awaited shift to an energy-efficient model.
articles.title: Find an Ethereum Bug Before the Merge? You Could Earn a $1M Reward

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Trabucco is leaving Alameda Research, but admits he “can’t 100% remove” himself from crypto.
articles.title: Alameda Research Co-CEO Sam Trabucco Steps Down to 'Relax'

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: John Hopkins crypto researcher Matthew Green wants to preserve the code for the sake of academic research and free speech.
articles.title: Professor Republishes Tornado Cash Code Following GitHub Takedown

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The network’s developers have given dates for when the move to proof of stake will take place.
articles.title: Ethereum Foundation Confirms Date for Long-Awaited Merge Upgrade

articles.description: Decentralized Pictures, the nonprofit co-founded by Roman Coppola, is enabling on-chain voting to greenlight and fund film projects. CEO Leo Matchett tells Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves how the anti-crypto stigma in Hollywood is fading, how Web3 can bring more diversity to the film world and disrupt the traditional gatekeepers, and how he first got into crypto when he and Coppola set up a Bitcoin miner in an empty sound stage.
articles.title: gm: Decentralized Pictures CEO on How Web3 Can Change Hollywood

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: A licensing deal between Mars and music label UMG means Bored Ape NFT images are now printed on M&M’s chocolate candies.
articles.title: These Bored Apes Will Melt in Your Mouth: M&M’s Releases NFT-Inspired Candy

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The stablecoin issuer has yet to receive a request to freeze Tornado Cash-affiliated accounts, but hinted it would comply if it did.
articles.title: Despite US Sanctions, Tether Continues To Support Tornado Cash: Report

articles.description: In this video, we’ll learn about a core component that defines Web3: blockchain nodes. A node is one of the many computers that power a decentralized network like Ethereum. Learn about the different types of nodes and why they’re part of the core infrastructure that make Web3 possible. Visit Infura.io today to start building. Written by: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is a Node?

articles.description: In this episode of Decrypt on the Street, reporter Sander Lutz jumps through hoops in the hopes of obtaining an exclusive "NFTiff" from Tiffany & Co. Sander learns manners and spiritual awareness from two coaches, only to fall short of the digital brass ring.
articles.title: Decrypt on the Street: An NFT Trip to Tiffany's, a Search for Status

articles.description: FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried is the man of the moment in crypto as he has bailed out multiple insolvent companies. Some are calling him Atlas, some sarcastically calling him savior. Sam answers tough questions from Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on FTX's bailout strategy, the controversial Voyager loan, his market outlook, marketing mistakes by crypto lenders, FTX competitors Binance and Coinbase, his political donations, and what he's learned about management.
articles.title: gm: Sam Bankman-Fried, Crypto Savior?

articles.description: Musician and NFT artist Jimmy Edgar is fully sold on NFT art, but not convinced yet on the uses of NFTs in the music world, he told Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Why Musician and NFT Artist Jimmy Edgar Remains Skeptical on Music NFTs

articles.description: Ava Labs President John Wu sits for an extensive chat about institutional interest in crypto and DeFi (it has "absolutely not waned") and use cases of Avalanche with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Avalanche House in Brooklyn on July 15, 2022.
articles.title: Avalanche's John Wu Talks Institutional Interest and Use Cases

articles.description:
In our latest Decrypt on the Street segment, reporter Sander Lutz investigates Chipotle’s recent crypto marketing campaign and talks to Chipotle customers about their sadness amid the crypto crash. 

Sander himself entered the contest hoping to get rich; instead he got a single cup of queso dip.
articles.title: Decrypt on the Street: Chipotle Says ‘Buy the Dip!’

articles.description: Decrypt's Jason Nelson reports from NFT Expoverse in LA with JP Bedoya, Chief Product Officer at Civic, the Web3 identity verification problem rolling out a new set of tools to keep people from spamming NFT drops to take advantage.
articles.title: How Civic Is Battling Web3 Bots and Spam: CPO JP Bedoya
